Description: Fragment of oval handle at neck join of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine buff-brown; cream slip. Rectangular stamp.
Production date: 200 BC (see N. Badoud, Le temps de Rhodes (2015) 142.)
Curator's comments: Ink, deleted, '40.'. Name Klearchos. From same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, ABC 0160.12.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (112)
